document_data.name: Elliot Graves
document_data.mainbody: '''Elliot Graves''' was a [[Harper]] and the servant and close confident of [[Loene]] in [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Description: Graves was a skilled soldier and chef.
document_data.History: In [[1361 DR]], Graves was living and working in Loene's townhouse in the [[Castle Ward]] near [[Castle Waterdeep]]. After [[Arilyn Moonblade]] showed up in tow with an injured [[Danilo Thann]], Graves was targeted and killed by the [[Harper Assassin]].
